name: Forest Gnome
appearance: A bearded man with a pointed hat.

name: Goblin
appearance: A green creature with pointed ears and a mischievous grin.

name: Bandit
appearance: A seemingly ordinary human who blends in.

name: Ogre
appearance: A very large, human-like being capable of destruction.

name: Ice Dragon
appearance: A large, blue bat-winged lizard with icicle-like structures hanging from its body.

name: Witch
appearance: A young, mysterious woman surrounded by a dark aura, wearing purple attire with a black cape and hat.

name: Sword of Light
desc: A blade capable of light abilities.

name: Staff of Flames
desc: A peculiar stick which summons flames and embers

name: Frying Pan
desc: An ordinary pan used for cooking.

name: Crossbow
desc: A heavy bow that deals heavy damage.

name: Heavy Stick
desc: A large branch cut from an oak tree.

name: Flashbang
desc: Temporarily stuns the enemy for a turn. Ineffective on the Witch.

name: Healh Potion
desc: Restores HP. Heals x2 of current HP.

name: Shield Potion
desc: Grants a shield. User is invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shriveled Pepper
desc: Upon consumption, make the Ice Dragon do 1.5x more damage.
